name: SmartDice
0:
”Alexa launch smart dice”
”Alexa open smart dice”
”Alexa start smart dice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart dice
des:
Let your kids play smart dice game and become the smartest player in World. You can be the coolest player and have your name shine on the Leader board. Keep playing, keep winning, improve your knowledge by answering simple questions, and hold your place tight on the leader board. Questions mainly consists of general knowledge and math. 

Your kids can play smart dice with you, their friends or even when they are all by themselves. They will get rewarded for their knowledge which will keep them motivated. 

Scores will be stored and compared with other players across your country for a place on the Leader board.
Newer questions will be added every day, so keep playing and keep getting back for updates.

Happy Lucky trip!!

Rules
***************************************************
User will have to score 100 points for winning the game.
Can play in Single Player or Multiplayer mode.
If the user has scored 99 Points, he/she should get another 1 point to win.
In multiplayer mode, the one who scores 100 point first will be winner.
If the User scores 99 points, then he/she should get 1 point to win. If user gets a 6 when he is at 99, the additional points won't add, and there will be negative marks for wrong answers. In short, the users will have to get an exact 100 to win the game.
Any number of Players can be added to the game. 
Single Player can play any number of times.
Can Resume the game after any number of Days.


Dice points
*************************************************************
If the dice rolls 1, he will get 1 point for the right answers and -1 for a Wrong answer.
If the dice rolls 2, he will get 2 points for the right answers and -2 for a Wrong answer.
If the dice rolls 3, correct answer will be rewarded with 3 points and wrong answer will make you loose 3 points
If the dice rolls 4, correct answer will be rewarded with 4 points and wrong answer will make you loose 4 points
when rolled 5, correct answer gives +5, wrong answer gives -5 points
roll 6 for 10 Points Bonus.

You can pause:
"Alexa, pause"

You can check your status at any point in game by saying,
"Alexa, what is my status"

you can ask Alexa to repeat question by saying
"Alexa, repeat the question."

For more detailed description and scoring details, visits us at:
https://pohostaging.club/smartDice/
